abstract: A plane was skywriting short phrases over the Hudson River and the West Side of Manhattan as part of an art project, called The Sky Is The Limit/NYC.
snippet: A plane was skywriting short phrases over the Hudson River and the West Side of Manhattan as part of an art project, called The Sky Is The Limit/NYC.
lead_paragraph: On a warm, clear Sunday afternoon, many New Yorkers looked up and saw not a cloud in the sky - except for the ones that were talking to them.

headline.main: Art Is Fleeting, at Least When It's in the Sky
